alert.note: Alert for Attala (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:14AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ATTALA AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 614 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Way, or 13 miles northeast of Canton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Camden around 625 AM CDT. Farmhaven around 635 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
